deliverystep.name: Base Services: LibXML2 CoreOS2 transfer

preq.title: XML DOM parser based on libxml2

deliverystep.preq: The Symbian OS XML services subsystem shall be extended with a new DOM API, the open source libxml2 library and a new libxml2-based SAX plug-in for the existing XML Parser Framework.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2621: Relocating header files
deliverystep.preq: Relocating Header files for XML API
